Type ReflectionExtensions

Namespace Machine.Fakes.Sdk

Helper class which contains all the helper method needed for reflection.

bool ClosesGenericParamType(this Type type)

Checks whether the supplied type closes the Param<TParam> class.
Parameters
Type type

Specifies the type to be checked.

Return
bool

true if the type closes the Param`1 type. Otherwise false.
